20101230023120.000|20101230023122.000|CC1|STREETS, THIS AFTER A WEEK OF

20101230023125.000|20101230023127.000|CC1|MUDSLIDES, SO DAMAGING ABOUT 100

20101230023137.000|20101230023139.000|CC1|CAUSE THE HUGE HILL NEXT TO HER

20101230023640.000|20101230023641.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PRIME MINISTER     
20101230023641.000|20101230023643.000|CC1|PUTIN HAS TAKEN OVER HIS WAY.

20101230023646.000|20101230023648.000|CC1|START WORKING."

20101230023655.000|20101230023657.000|CC1|MOSTLY SHUT FOR TWO DAYS AFTER  
20101230023657.000|20101230023658.000|CC1|NECK SNAPPING CHANGES IN        
20101230023658.000|20101230023700.000|CC1|TEMPERATURE.                    
20101230023700.000|20101230023701.000|CC1|WARMER WEATHER MELTED SNOW, THEN
20101230023701.000|20101230023703.000|CC1|COLD WEATHER FROZE THE WATER.   
20101230023703.000|20101230023704.000|CC1|PLANES AND TARMAC COVERED IN A  
20101230023704.000|20101230023707.000|CC1|SHEET OF ICE.

20101230023710.000|20101230023712.000|CC1|SHOUTING "SHAME, SHAME," THEY

20101230023715.000|20101230023717.000|CC1|FOOD, WATER, TRANSPORT HOME.

20101230024505.000|20101230024506.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PARAMEDICS FOUND

20101230024551.000|20101230024552.000|CC1|>> SOMEBODY SAID THIS IS SORT OF

20101230024555.000|20101230024556.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THERE'S BEEN       
20101230024556.000|20101230024558.000|CC1|CORPORATE INTRIGUE.             
20101230024558.000|20101230024603.000|CC1|IN 1975, BUSCH'S FATHER, AUGUST 
20101230024603.000|20101230024604.000|CC1|BUSCH III, STAGED A BOARDROOM   
20101230024604.000|20101230024605.000|CC1|COUP TO REPLACE HIS FATHER AS   
20101230024605.000|20101230024607.000|CC1|CEO AND ONLY RELUCTANTLY HANDED

20101230024610.000|20101230024611.000|CC1|MEMBER OF HIS FAMILY TO RUN THE 
20101230024611.000|20101230024612.000|CC1|BREWERY THAT BEARS THEIR NAME,  
20101230024612.000|20101230024614.000|CC1|AND HE'S LIKELY TO HAVE BEEN THE
20101230024614.000|20101230024616.000|CC1|LAST.                           
20101230024616.000|20101230024618.000|CC1|>> THE KING OF BEERS.           
20101230024618.000|20101230024619.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SOON AFTER HE TOOK

20101230025630.000|20101230025631.000|CC1|TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE SPECIES.

20101230025636.000|20101230025637.000|CC1|68 DEGREES FAHRENHEIT, THEY CAN 
20101230025637.000|20101230025639.000|CC1|BECOME SUSCEPTIBLE TO SOMETHING 
20101230025639.000|20101230025640.000|CC1|CALLED COLD STRESS SYNDROME.    
20101230025640.000|20101230025642.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN FLORIDA WHERE   
20101230025642.000|20101230025644.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN BELOW FREEZING 25 DAYS
